short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A small extension to limit the number of open tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you tired of too many open tabs? This handy extension helps you to limit the number of open tabs. It automatically closes the oldest and at least used tabs.
